job_description:
Must Haves

7+ years experience in Java based development utilizing a combination of WebSphere, JDBC, Oracle, DB2, DataPower and associated Web technologies including JavaScript and JSP
5+ years experience in integration of Open Source Software (OSS) products into new and existing systems
Experience in development and design of new mid-tier applications or enhancement to existing ones in a DevOPS focused environment (current environment: IBM WebSphere - Java EE - Oracle and DB2 / new environment: Angular or React.js - Java SpringBoot - Cloud computing).
